definition: surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: He was anointed princeps ; the Roman empire is said to begin with his accession.
sentences.chinese: 他被奉为元首，罗马帝国据说就是从他即位开始。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 随后两国元首共同会见了中智两国和国际传媒记者。

sentences.english: But bleeding-heart arguments don't necessarily tell heads of state to move their money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，出血，心论据并不一定告诉元首将他们的钱。

sentences.english: He should be grateful to the Fuehrer that he still has private property.
sentences.chinese: 他应该为自己还拥有私有财产而对元首感恩戴德。

sentences.english: Would you give up your life to save the president of your country?
sentences.chinese: 你会舍身救你的国家元首吗？

sentences.english: Both heads of state also exchanged views on bilateral cooperation in counter-terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 两国元首还就中约反恐合作交换了意见。

sentences.english: It is diplomatic protocol for all visiting heads of state to lay a wreath here.
sentences.chinese: 所有来访的国家元首敬献花圈都是外交礼仪。

sentences.english: His great abilities might have prevented many a blunder at the Fuehrer's headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他的非凡才能可能使元首大本营避免铸成许多大错。

sentences.english: Theoretically, the monarch embodies supremacy as head of state. P130
sentences.chinese: 理论上，君主如同国家元首般享有至高无上的权力。

sentences.english: Following the talks, the two leaders attended the signing ceremony of bilateral cooperation documents.
sentences.chinese: 会谈后，两国元首出席了双边合作文件的签字仪式。

sentences.english: The parliament then elects a president, who functions as the head of state.
sentences.chinese: 然后再由国会选举总统，作为国家元首。

sentences.english: Exhausted, she heads home for Christmas to make a new to-do list.
sentences.chinese: 精疲力竭，她回家过圣诞节元首作出新的工作清单。

sentences.english: Guinea-Bissau first head of state dies.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚比绍首任国家元首去世。

sentences.english: The intake manifold casting was machined to fit and bolted in place between the heads.
sentences.chinese: 在进气歧管铸造加工，以适应和螺栓在两国元首。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games shall be proclaimed open by the Head of State of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会由东道国国家元首宣布开幕。

sentences.english: The Admiral and successor of the Fuhrer will now speak to the German people. In his speech, Admiral Doenitz said
sentences.chinese: 海军元帅兼元首继承人现在将对德国人民讲话。

definition: prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
commander-in-chief/top military commander for a country or theater of operations
Roosevelt (name)/Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919), US President 1901-1909/Franklin D. Roosevelt (1882-1945), US President 1933-1945
Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943
